title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta is cooking, sauté the guanciale until crispy.
In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, cheese, and pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving some pasta water. Add to the pan with the guanciale.
Remove from heat, quickly mix in the egg mixture and a splash of pasta water to create a creamy sauce. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic, then add spices and tomatoes.
Simmer the sauce, then stir in the heavy cream and cooked chicken. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Fresh Garden Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light vinaigrette.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Drizzle with vinaigrette and toss gently to coat. Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a variety of colorful vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat a wok or large pan with oil.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add ginger and garlic, stir for one minute.
Pour in soy sauce and toss everything to combine. Serve over rice.
